price: 26. Él es el único con conocimiento absoluto del gaib[1090], y no desvela a nadie tal conocimiento;
arabic: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
footnotes: [1090]  Ver la primera nota de la aleya 3 de la sura 2.

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: ʿālimu al-ghaybi falā yuẓ'hiru ʿalā ghaybihi aḥadan
